thread.title_full: David Attenborough says he doesn't plan on retiring from our TVs any time soon - Hereford Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Hereford Times
title: David Attenborough says he doesn't plan on retiring from our TVs any time soon - Hereford Times
text:
Everyone's favourite nature wiz Sir David Attenborough went through two separate gruelling knee operations to keep on making great television documentaries - and he doesn't plan on throwing in the towel any time soon. Sir David, who will be 90 in May, told the Daily Mail Weekend magazine: "I had one done.
 Hereford Times.
